content: Your data is stored on a secure server that complies with security standards.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a security-related message about data storage on a secure server. It appears in the PortalSettings category and is likely used as a tooltip or label.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Məlumatlarınız təhlükəsizlik standartlarına uyğun təhlükəsiz serverdə saxlanılır" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the nuance of "Your data is stored on a secure server that complies with security standards." The term "təhlükəsiz" is repeated and sounds awkward. It should convey the idea of a server that *is* secure and compliant, not just one that *has* security.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Məlumatlarınız təhlükəsizlik standartlarına cavab verən və təhlükəsiz bir serverdə saxlanılır.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Tietosi on tallennettu" is grammatically awkward. "Tietosi on" should be "Tietosi on". While understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tietosi on tallennettu turvalliselle palvelimelle, joka on turvallisuusstandardien mukainen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, 'mukainen' can be interpreted as 'in accordance with' which doesn't perfectly capture the sense of 'complying with'.  A more accurate rendering of 'complies with' might be 'noudattaa'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tietosi on tallennettu turvalliselle palvelimelle, joka noudattaa turvallisuusstandardeja.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ປອດໄພ' (pod-pai) is used for 'safe' or 'secure.' While acceptable, 'ຄວາມປອດໄພ' (khwam pod-pai) – meaning 'security' – might be more precise in this context and align better with the English phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຂໍ້ມູນຂອງທ່ານຖືກເກັບຮັກສາໄວ້ໃນເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍທີ່ມີຄວາມປອດໄພເຊິ່ງສອດຄ່ອງກັບມາດຕະຖານຄວາມປອດໄພ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබගේ දත්ත ආරක්ෂිත ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල වන ආරක්ෂිත සේවයක මත ගබඩා කර ඇත' while conveying a similar meaning, isn't the most natural or precise translation of 'Your data is stored on a secure server that complies with security standards.' The phrasing 'ආරක්ෂිත සේවයක මත' is a bit awkward.  'ආරක්ෂිත සේවකය' (aaraksitha sewayakaya) means 'on a secure server'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ දත්ත ආරක්ෂිත ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල වන ආරක්ෂිත සේවකයක ගබඩා කර ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repeated use of 'ආරක්ෂිත' (aaraksitha - secure) can be slightly repetitive.  While not strictly incorrect, it could be improved for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබගේ දත්ත ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල වන ආරක්ෂිත සේවකයක ගබඩා කර ඇත.
